sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import {Box, Center, ChakraProvider, Divider, Text, Stack, Image, Container, ListItem, UnorderedList, Heading, Link, Flex } from '@chakra-ui/react';

const Footer = () => {
    return (
        <ChakraProvider>
            <Center>
                <Box maxW="1364px">
                    <Divider />
                </Box>
            </Center>
            <Container maxW="1364px">
                <Stack>
                    <Box mb={10}>

                    <Flex
                    direction="row"
                    justify='left'
                    css={{
                        flexFlow: "row wrap"
                    }}
                    >
                        <Box bg="tomato">
                            <Heading w={["150px"]} ml="15px" mb="30px" mt="30px" as="h4" size="sm">Learn</Heading>
                            <UnorderedList >
                                <Stack direction="column" spacing="10px">
                                    <Link><ListItem style={{margin: "0"},{padding: "0"}} fontSize="sm">Help center</ListItem></Link>
                                    <Link><ListItem fontSize="sm">Join ZEN team</ListItem></Link>
                                    <Link><ListItem fontSize="sm">Privacy Policy</ListItem></Link>
                                    <Link><ListItem fontSize="sm">Cookies</ListItem></Link>
                                    <Link><ListItem fontSize="sm">Terms of use</ListItem></Link>
                                </Stack>
                            </UnorderedList>
                        </Box>

                        <Box bg="blue.400" ml={['','','','50px']}>
                            <Heading w={["150px"]} ml="15px" mb="30px" mt="30px" as="h4" size="sm">Discover</Heading>
                            <UnorderedList style={{listStyleType: "none"}}>
                                <Stack direction="column" spacing="10px">
                                    <Link><ListItem fontSize="sm">Help center</ListItem></Link>
                                    <Link><ListItem fontSize="sm">Join ZEN team</ListItem></Link>
                                    <Link><ListItem fontSize="sm">Privacy Policy</ListItem></Link>
                                </Stack>
                            </UnorderedList>
                        </Box>

                        <Box ml={['','','','50px']}>
                            <Heading w={["150px"]} ml="15px" mb="30px" mt="30px" as="h4" size="sm">Offer</Heading>
                            <UnorderedList style={{listStyleType: "none"}}>
                                <Stack direction="column" spacing="10px">
                                    <Link><ListItem fontSize="sm">Help center</ListItem></Link>
                                    <Link><ListItem fontSize="sm">Join ZEN team</ListItem></Link>
                                </Stack>
                            </UnorderedList>
                        </Box>

                        <Box ml={['','','','50px']}>
                            <Heading w={["150px"]} ml="15px" mb="30px" mt="30px" as="h4" size="sm">Language</Heading>
                            <UnorderedList style={{listStyleType: "none"}}>
                                <Stack direction="column" spacing="10px">
                                    <Link><ListItem fontSize="sm">Help center</ListItem></Link>
                                    <Link><ListItem fontSize="sm">Join ZEN team</ListItem></Link>
                                    <Link><ListItem fontSize="sm">Privacy Policy</ListItem></Link>
                                    <Link><ListItem fontSize="sm">Cookies</ListItem></Link>
                                    <Link><ListItem fontSize="sm">Terms of use</ListItem></Link>
                                </Stack>
                            </UnorderedList>
                        </Box>

                        <Box ml={['','','','50px']}>
                            <Heading w={["150px"]} ml="15px" mb="30px" mt="30px" as="h4" size="sm">Follow us</Heading>
                            <Link><Image w="40px" ml="30px" name="Linkedin" src="in.png" /></Link>
                        </Box>

                        <Box ml={['','','','50px']}>
                            <Heading w={["150px"]} ml="15px" mb="30px" mt="30px" as="h4" size="sm">Contact</Heading>
                            <UnorderedList style={{listStyleType: "none"}}>
                                <Stack direction="column" spacing="10px">
                                    <Link><ListItem fontSize="sm">hello@zen.com</ListItem></Link>
                                </Stack>
                            </UnorderedList>
                        </Box>
                    </Flex>

                    </Box>
                    <Box mb={10}>
                        <Stack direction={['column','column','row','row']} spacing={['','','','300px']}>
                            <Box>
                                <Image src="/zen-zero-effort-grey.png" />
                                <Box maxW="900px" mt={5}>
                                    <Text fontSize="12px" color="#AAAAAA">ZEN.COM is a licensed financial institution under the supervision of the Central Bank of Lithuania approved by European Banking Authority for 31 countries. Registration number of the company 304749651, VAT ID LT100011714916. License of electronic money institutions number LB000457. Share capital 2.185.000,00 EUR. Company address: Mėsinių g. 5, LT-01133, Vilnius, Lithuania. Sales Office: ul. Emilii Plater 53, 00-113 Warsaw, Poland.</Text>
                                </Box>
                            </Box>
                            <Box>
                                <Image maxW="175px" src="/pci-certificate-logo.png" mt={10} />
                            </Box>
                        </Stack>
                    </Box>
                </Stack>
            </Container>
        </ChakraProvider>
    )
}

export default Footer
